1.text: Brush your hair, then part it down the middle.

3.text: Tease your pigtails if you want more volume.

4.text: Twist your first pigtail into a rope.

5.text: Coil the rope into a bun, then secure it with a hair tie.

6.text: Repeat the process for the second bun.

7.text: Touch up your buns as desired.

8.text: Mist the space buns with hairspray.

9.text: Brush your hair, then create a center part.

10.text: Pull 1 half of your hair into a loose bun to keep it out of the way.

13.text: Twist the ponytail into a bun, then secure it with a hair tie.

14.text: Undo the temporary bun from on the other side and repeat the process.

16.text: Make any finishing touches, then mist the space buns with hairspray.

17.text: Brush your hair, then part it down the middle.

18.text: Pull your hair into 2 pigtails and secure them with hair ties.

19.text: Braid the pigtails and secure them with clear hair elastics.

20.text: Pull on the outer loops of the braids to volumize them, if desired.

21.text: Wrap the braids into buns and secure then with hair ties.

22.text: Touch up your hair as needed, then mist it with hairspray.
